00060 {
00061 public:
00062         HotTracked() : Property(
00063                 "HotTracked",
00064                 "Property to get/set the state of the state of the 'hot-tracked' setting for the thumb.  Value is either \"True\" or \"False\".",
00065                 "True")
00066         {}
